Properties.ProtectedString:
Tool = script.Parent
local stillEquipped = false
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) stillEquipped = true if mouse == nil then print("Mouse not found") return end while stillEquipped do print("Setting Mouse to go") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunCursor.png" while Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end print("Setting Mouse to wait") mouse.Icon = "rbxasset://textures\\GunWaitCursor.png" while not Tool.Enabled and stillEquipped do wait(0.01) end end end
function onUnequippedLocal() stillEquipped = false end
Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local quiver local quiverWeld local arrows = {}
local debris = game:GetService("Debris")
Tool.Enabled = true
arrow = Instance.new("Part") arrow.FormFactor = 3 arrow.Shape = "Block" arrow.Size = Vector3.new(3.0, 0.5, 0.5) arrow.CanCollide = false arrow.Name = "Arrow"
arrowMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") arrowMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65940206" arrowMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65914429" arrowMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1, 1, 1) arrowMesh.Parent = arrow
local damage = 40
local arrows = {}
local arrowWeld
local spamArrow
function onTouch(arrow, hit) if arrow and hit and hit.Parent then local character = hit.Parent local humanoid = character:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if humanoid ~= nil and myHumanoid ~= nil and humanoid ~= myHumanoid then tag = arrow:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag.Parent = humanoid end if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 90 end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) damage = 40 end if arrow and hit.Name ~= "Arrow" then arrow:Remove() end end end
function shoot(arrow, direction) vCharacter = Tool.Parent if vCharacter == nil or vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") == nil then return end
vPlayer = game.Players:GetPlayerFromCharacter(vCharacter) if vPlayer == nil then return end
local spawnPos = vCharacter.Torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + direction.unit * 7.0
local sign = -1
spamArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpamArrow") if spamArrow and spamArrow.Value == 1 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 0.0 for i = 1, 7 do local d1 = direction arrows[i] = arrow:Clone() if i ~= 0 then d1 = CFrame.Angles(0, (i-1) * sign * math.pi/30, 0) * direction end local spawnPos = vCharacter.Torso.Position spawnPos = spawnPos + direction.unit * 7.0
arrows[i].CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + d1) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0) arrows[i].Velocity = d1 * 60.0
local arrowFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") arrowFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, arrow:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) arrowFloat.Parent = arrows[i]
arrows[i].Name = "Arrow"
arrows[i].CanCollide = false
arrows[i].Parent = game.Workspace
arrows[i].Touched:connect(function(hit) onTouch(arrows[i], hit) end) debris:AddItem(arrows[i], 500) sign = sign * -1
--arrows[i].Anchored = true end myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 else arrow.CFrame = CFrame.new(spawnPos, spawnPos + direction) * CFrame.Angles(0, math.pi/2, 0)
local arrowFloat = Instance.new("BodyForce") arrowFloat.force = Vector3.new(0.0, arrow:GetMass() * 196.1, 0.0) arrowFloat.Parent = arrow
arrow.Velocity = direction.unit * 70.0 arrow.RotVelocity = Vector3.new(0.0, 0.0, 0.0) arrow.Name = "Arrow" arrow.Parent = game.Workspace arrow.CanCollide = false
arrow.Touched:connect(function(hit) onTouch(arrow, hit) end) debris:AddItem(arrow, 5) end end
function onActivated() if Tool.Enabled == false then return end
Tool.Enabled = false
vCharacter = Tool.Parent myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso == nil then return end
myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end arrowClone = arrow:Clone()
wait(0.6) target = myHumanoid.TargetPoint direction = (target - vCharacter.Torso.Position).unit shoot(arrowClone, direction)
wait(2.0) Tool.Enabled = true end
function onEquipped() print("On equip") vCharacter = Tool.Parent torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") if torso ~= nil and vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Quiver") == nil then quiver = Instance.new("Part") quiver.Name = "Quiver" quiver.Shape = "Block" quiver.FormFactor = 3 quiver.Size = Vector3.new(1.2, 0.5, 2.0) quiver.CanCollide = false quiver.Parent = vCharacter
quiverMesh = Instance.new("SpecialMesh") quiverMesh.MeshId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65942352" quiverMesh.TextureId = "http://www.roblox.com/asset/?id=65941746" quiverMesh.Scale = Vector3.new(1.2,1.2,1.2) quiverMesh.Parent = quiver
quiverWeld = Instance.new("Weld") quiverWeld.Name = "QuiverHolder" quiverWeld.Part0 = torso quiverWeld.Part1 = quiver quiverWeld.C1 = CFrame.new(Vector3.new(0.0, -0.2, -0.65)) quiverWeld.Parent = torso
rightArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Right Arm") leftArm = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Left Arm") if rightArm then rightGrip = rightArm:FindFirstChild("RightGrip") end if rightGrip then rightGrip.Parent = leftArm rightGrip.Name = "LeftGrip" rightGrip.Part0 = leftArm rightGrip.Part1 = Bow end end end
function onUnequipped() if vCharacter then torso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso") end
if torso then quiver = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Quiver") quiverWeld = torso:FindFirstChild("QuiverHolder") end
if quiver then quiver:Remove() end if quiverWeld then quiverWeld:Remove() end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivated) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquipped) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequipped)

local Tool = script.Parent local Bow = Tool.Handle
local vCharacter local walkAnim local arrowAnim
local spamArrow local co
local debounce = false
function onKeyDown(key) if key:lower() == "q" then if debounce == false then spamArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpamArrow") if spamArrow then spamArrow.Value = 1 co = coroutine.create(reset) coroutine.resume(co) debounce = true end end end end
function reset() wait(5) spamArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("SpamArrow") if spamArrow then spamArrow.Value = 0 end wait(5) debounce = false end
function onActivatedLocal() vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid == nil then return end arrowAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.ArrowAnim) if arrowAnim then arrowAnim:Play() end
wait(1.0)
end
function onEquippedLocal(mouse) vCharacter = Tool.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") if myHumanoid then walkAnim = myHumanoid:LoadAnimation(Tool.BowWalk) walkAnim:Play() end
mouse.KeyDown:connect(onKeyDown) end
function onUnequippedLocal() if walkAnim then walkAnim:Stop() end if arrowAnim then arrowAnim:Stop()end
iceArrow = Tool:FindFirstChild("IceArrow") if iceArrow then iceArrow.Value = 0 end end
Tool.Activated:connect(onActivatedLocal) Tool.Equipped:connect(onEquippedLocal) Tool.Unequipped:connect(onUnequippedLocal)

local arrow = script.Parent
local damage = 50
function onTouch(hit) if hit.Parent then vChar = hit.Parent humanoid = vChar:FindFirstChild("Humanoid")
if humanoid ~= nil then tag = arrow:FindFirstChild("creator") if tag then tag.Parent = humanoid end if hit.Name == "Head" then damage = 100 end humanoid:TakeDamage(damage) damage = 45
fire = arrow:FindFirstChild("Ice") if fire then fire.Parent = vChar.Torso newScript = script.ColdScript newScript.Parent = vChar newScript.Disabled = false end end arrow:Remove() end end
arrow.Touched:connect(onTouch)

vCharacter = script.Parent myHumanoid = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Humanoid") myTorso = vCharacter:FindFirstChild("Torso")
local count = 5 while myHumanoid and count > 0 do myHumanoid:TakeDamage(7) myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = myHumanoid.WalkSpeed - 8.0 count = count - 1 wait(1.0) end
if (myHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 8.0) < 20.0 then myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = myHumanoid.WalkSpeed + 8.0 else myHumanoid.WalkSpeed = 16.0 end
if myTorso then fire = myTorso:FindFirstChild("Ice") if fire then fire:Remove() end end wait(1.0)
script:Remove()
